com.smartdevicesdk.database

类 DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartdevicesdk.database.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that wraps the most common database operations. This example assumes you want a single table and data entity with two properties: a title and a priority as an integer. Modify in all relevant locations if you need other/more properties for your data and/or additional tables.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      DatabaseHelper(android.content.Context context)
      Construct a new database helper object

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Add a new row to the database table
      void delete(long id)
      Delete the specified row from the database table.
      android.content.ContentValues get(long id)
      Return values for a single row with the specified id
      android.database.Cursor getAll()
      Return a cursor object with all rows in the table.
      void update(long id, java.lang.String title, int priority)
      Updates a row in the database table with new column values, without changing the unique id of the row.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • DatabaseHelper

        public DatabaseHelper(android.content.Context context)
        Construct a new database helper object
        参数:
        context - The current context for the application or activity

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAll

        public android.database.Cursor getAll()
        Return a cursor object with all rows in the table.
        返回:
        A cursor suitable for use in a SimpleCursorAdapter

      • add

        public long add(byte[] bytearray)
        Add a new row to the database table
        返回:
        The unique id of the newly added row

      • delete

        public void delete(long id)
        Delete the specified row from the database table. For simplicity reasons, nothing happens if this operation fails.
        参数:
        id - The unique id for the row to delete

      • get

        public android.content.ContentValues get(long id)
        Return values for a single row with the specified id
        参数:
        id - The unique id for the row o fetch
        返回:
        All column values are stored as properties in the ContentValues object

      • update

        public void update(long id,
          java.lang.String title,
          int priority)
        Updates a row in the database table with new column values, without changing the unique id of the row. For simplicity reasons, nothing happens if this operation fails.
        参数:
        id - The unique id of the row to update
        title - The new title value
        priority - The new priority value
